comments: Antoine was one of my favorite French professors during my time at Oregon. His classes were very engaging and he expected the best from each student. He was very passionate about the material that he presented and inspired me to become a better French student. I wish I could have more classes taught by Antoine.
Doesn\'t care for teaching. I have no idea why he still has a job at the university. No help to the students and comes off very arrogant.

Don\'t take French from him unless you want to fail or work your butt off. I studied all the time and normally had been a good friend student, especially good at essay writing - which he gave me Cs on all my essays. He was useless when I went to get help and he didn\'t seem to enjoy teaching. He grades realllly hard!!
